fi.tamk.lucidstudio.tiltbeat

Class GameMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • fi.tamk.lucidstudio.tiltbeat.GameMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class GameMain
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    This class is the main class for the game. It acts as a host for the different screens and handles the preferences and assets of the game. It also owns the classes used for rendering the game.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.badlogic.gdx.Game

      • isUseAccelerometerX

        public boolean isUseAccelerometerX()
        Returns whether the accelerometer's X-axis or Z-axis is in use for vertical movement. True means X-axis is in use, false means Z-axis is in use.
        Returns:
        whether the X-axis is in use or not.

      • getActiveSectors

        public boolean[] getActiveSectors()
        Returns a boolean array of which sectors are active. The sector numbers go up clockwise starting from the first sector after 12 o'clock.
        Returns:
        a boolean array of which sectors are active.

      • setActiveSectors

        public void setActiveSectors(boolean[] activeSectors)
        Sets the active sectors in the player shape according to a boolean array. The sector numbers go up clockwise starting from the first sector after 12 o'clock.
        Parameters:
        activeSectors - boolean array determining which sectors are active

      • resetActiveSectors

        public void resetActiveSectors(int sectors)
        Changes the activeSectors to the right length. Sets all the sectors active in the player shape. The sector numbers go up clockwise starting from the first sector after 12 o'clock.
        Parameters:
        sectors - how many sectors in the player shape

      • setActiveSector

        public void setActiveSector(int sector,
                            boolean active)
        Sets a single sector active or inactive. The sector numbers go up clockwise starting from the first sector after 12 o'clock.
        Parameters:
        sector - the number of the sector.
        active - boolean whether the sector should be se to active or inactive.
